<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In tools that will exit soon anyway, going through the process of explicitly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deallocating resources can be unnecessary - better to leak the resources and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// let the OS clean them up when the process ends. Use this function to ensure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the memory is not misdiagnosed as an unintentional leak by leak detection</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tools (this is achieved by preserving pointers to the object in a globally</span></CodeLine>
